pages.text: In a cozy oak tree lived Squeaky, a squirrel famous for one thing: his Great Acorn Pie! One sunny morning, while gathering ingredients, he tripped. Oh no! Everything spilled.

pages.description: Help Squeaky sort his ingredients! Drag the food into the pie basket.

pages.text: With your help, Squeaky gathered all the yummy ingredients. He mixed and baked until a wonderful smell filled the forest. His pie was perfect!
Squeaky shared his Great Acorn Pie with all of his friends. There was plenty for everyone, and it was the most delicious pie they had ever tasted. Hooray for Squeaky!
